languages.text: {n}Мужчина отвечает счастливым смехом.{/n} "Есть. Они прячутся. Ждут. Раньше нас было много, теперь мало. Кровь выродилась, плоть ослабла. Мы почти умерли. Но ты приш{mf|ел|ла}, и это хорошо. Ты и твои люди дадут новую силу нашей крови, твой корабль увезет Кормителей к новым мирам. Мы возродимся".

{n}The man responds with joyful laughter.{/n} "They are here. They are hiding. Waiting. Once we were many; now we are but few. Our blood degenerated. Our flesh grew weak. We were on the verge of death. But you have come, and that is good. You and your people will infuse our blood with a new power. Your ship will take the Nourishers to new worlds. We will rise again."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина отвечает счастливым смехом.{/n} "Есть. Они прячутся. Ждут. Раньше нас было много, теперь мало. Кровь выродилась, плоть ослабла. Мы почти умерли. Но ты приш{mf|ел|ла}, и это хорошо. Ты и твои люди дадут новую силу нашей крови, твой корабль увезет Кормителей к новым мирам. Мы возродимся".

We were on the verge of death. But you have come, and that is good. You and your people will infuse our blood with a new power. Your ship will take the Nourishers to new worlds. We shall rise again."

We were on the verge of death. But you have come, and that is good. You and your people will infuse our blood with a new power. Your ship will take the Nourishers to new worlds. We shall rise again."

We were on the verge of death. But you have come, and that is good. You and your people will infuse our blood with a new power. Your ship will take the Nourishers to new worlds. We will rise again."

{n}The man responds with joyful laughter.{/n} "They are here. They are hiding. Waiting. Once we were many; now we are but few. Our blood degenerated. Our flesh grew weak. We were on the verge of death. But you have come, and that is good. You and your people will infuse our blood with a new power. Your ship will take the Nourishers to new worlds. We will rise again."

{n}The man responds with joyful laughter.{/n} "They are here. They are hiding. Waiting. Once we were many; now we are but few. Our blood degenerated. Our flesh grew weak. We were on the verge of death. But you have come, and that is good. You and your people will infuse our blood with a new power. Your ship will take the Nourishers to new worlds. We will rise again."

languages.text: {n}El hombre responde con una risotada jovial.{/n} «Están aquí, pero se esconden. Una vez fuimos muchos, ahora somos pocos. Nuestra sangre degeneró. Nuestra carne se volvió débil. Estábamos a punto de morir. Pero has venido, y eso es bueno. Tu gente y tú imbuiréis nuestra sangre con nuevo poder. Tu nave llevará a los Nutridores a nuevos mundos. Resurgiremos».
languages.original_text: {n}The man responds with joyful laughter.{/n} "They are here. They are hiding. Waiting. Once we were many; now we are but few. Our blood degenerated. Our flesh grew weak. We were on the verge of death. But you have come, and that is good. You and your people will infuse our blood with a new power. Your ship will take the Nourishers to new worlds. We will rise again."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre responde con una risotada jovial.{/n} «Están aquí, pero se esconden. Una vez fuimos muchos, ahora somos pocos. Nuestra sangre degeneró. Nuestra carne se volvió débil. Estábamos a punto de morir. Pero has venido, y eso es bueno. Tu gente y tú imbuiréis nuestra sangre con nuevo poder. Tu nave llevará a los Nutridores a nuevos mundos. Resurgiremos».

languages.text: {n}那个人以欢乐的笑声回应着你。{/n}“他们都在这里，躲藏着，等待着。我们曾经为数众多，但如今寥寥无几。我们的血脉退化了，身体越来越脆弱，已经处于死亡的边缘。但你来了，这是个好消息。你和你的人民将为我们的血脉注入新的力量。你的飞船将会把滋养者带到新的世界，我们将再度崛起。”
languages.original_text: {n}The man responds with joyful laughter.{/n} "They are here. They are hiding. Waiting. Once we were many; now we are but few. Our blood degenerated. Our flesh grew weak. We were on the verge of death. But you have come, and that is good. You and your people will infuse our blood with a new power. Your ship will take the Nourishers to new worlds. We will rise again."

traits.locale_text: {n}那个人以欢乐的笑声回应着你。{/n}“他们都在这里，躲藏着，等待着。我们曾经为数众多，但如今寥寥无几。我们的血脉退化了，身体越来越脆弱，已经处于死亡的边缘。但你来了，这是个好消息。你和你的人民将为我们的血脉注入新的力量。你的飞船将会把滋养者带到新的世界，我们将再度崛起。”

languages.text: {n}男は嬉しそうに笑って答える。{/n}「彼らはここにいるさ。身を隠して、待っている。昔はもっと多かったが、今はほんの数人。我々の血は退化した。肉は弱くなった。死の危機に瀕していた。しかしお前が現れた、良い兆候だよ。お前と仲間達は、我々の血に新たな力を吹き込むだろう。お前の宇宙船はナリッシャーを新しい世界へ連れて行く。我々は再び立ち上がるのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The man responds with joyful laughter.{/n} "They are here. They are hiding. Waiting. Once we were many; now we are but few. Our blood degenerated. Our flesh grew weak. We were on the verge of death. But you have come, and that is good. You and your people will infuse our blood with a new power. Your ship will take the Nourishers to new worlds. We will rise again."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は嬉しそうに笑って答える。{/n}「彼らはここにいるさ。身を隠して、待っている。昔はもっと多かったが、今はほんの数人。我々の血は退化した。肉は弱くなった。死の危機に瀕していた。しかしお前が現れた、良い兆候だよ。お前と仲間達は、我々の血に新たな力を吹き込むだろう。お前の宇宙船はナリッシャーを新しい世界へ連れて行く。我々は再び立ち上がるのだ」

languages.text: {n}Der Mann antwortet mit fröhlichem Lachen.{/n} "Sie sind hier. Sie verstecken sich. Sie warten. Einst waren wir viele, jetzt nur noch wenige. Unser Blut ist degeneriert. Unser Fleisch wurde schwach. Wir standen am Rand des Todes. Aber Ihr seid gekommen, und das ist gut. Ihr und Eure Leute werdet unserem Blut neue Kraft geben. Euer Schiff wird die Nährer zu neuen Welten tragen. Wir werden uns wieder erheben."
languages.original_text: {n}The man responds with joyful laughter.{/n} "They are here. They are hiding. Waiting. Once we were many; now we are but few. Our blood degenerated. Our flesh grew weak. We were on the verge of death. But you have come, and that is good. You and your people will infuse our blood with a new power. Your ship will take the Nourishers to new worlds. We will rise again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann antwortet mit fröhlichem Lachen.{/n} "Sie sind hier. Sie verstecken sich. Sie warten. Einst waren wir viele, jetzt nur noch wenige. Unser Blut ist degeneriert. Unser Fleisch wurde schwach. Wir standen am Rand des Todes. Aber Ihr seid gekommen, und das ist gut. Ihr und Eure Leute werden unserem Blut neue Kraft geben. Euer Schiff wird die Nährer zu neuen Welten tragen. Wir werden und wieder erheben."

languages.text: {n}L'homme répond avec un rire enjoué.{/n} « Ils sont là. Ils se cachent. Ils attendent. Nous étions nombreux autrefois, mais il ne reste plus que quelques-uns d'entre nous. Notre sang a dégénéré. Notre chair s'est affaiblie. Nous étions à deux doigts de disparaître. Heureusement, vous êtes {mf|venu|venue}. Vous et les vôtres imprégnerez notre sang d'un nouveau pouvoir. Votre vaisseau conduira les Nourrisseurs à de nouveaux mondes. Nous renaîtrons. »
languages.original_text: {n}The man responds with joyful laughter.{/n} "They are here. They are hiding. Waiting. Once we were many; now we are but few. Our blood degenerated. Our flesh grew weak. We were on the verge of death. But you have come, and that is good. You and your people will infuse our blood with a new power. Your ship will take the Nourishers to new worlds. We will rise again."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme répond avec un rire enjoué.{/n} « Ils sont là. Ils se cachent. Ils attendent. Nous étions nombreux autrefois, mais il ne reste plus que quelques-uns d'entre nous. Notre sang a dégénéré. Notre chair s'est affaiblie. Nous étions à deux doigts de disparaître. Heureusement, vous êtes {mf|venu|venue}. Vous et les vôtres imprégnerez notre sang d'un nouveau pouvoir. Votre vaisseau conduira les Nourrisseurs à de nouveaux mondes. Nous renaîtrons. »

languages.text: {n}Adam, neşeli bir kahkahayla karşılık veriyor.{/n} "Buradalar. Saklanıyor, doğru zamanı bekliyorlar. Bir zamanlar kalabalıktık ancak sayımız azaldı. Etimiz gücünü yitirdi. Ölümün kıyısındaydık. Sonra siz geldiniz. İyi ki geldiniz... Siz ve insanlarınız, kanımıza yeni bir güç katacaksınız. Geminiz, Besleyenler'i yeni dünyalara taşıyacak. Küllerimizden doğacağız."
languages.original_text: {n}The man responds with joyful laughter.{/n} "They are here. They are hiding. Waiting. Once we were many; now we are but few. Our blood degenerated. Our flesh grew weak. We were on the verge of death. But you have come, and that is good. You and your people will infuse our blood with a new power. Your ship will take the Nourishers to new worlds. We will rise again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adam, neşeli bir kahkahayla karşılık veriyor.{/n} "Buradalar. Saklanıyor, doğru zamanı bekliyorlar. Bir zamanlar kalabalıktık ancak sayımız azaldı. Etimiz gücünü yitirdi. Ölümün kıyısındaydık. Sonra siz geldiniz. İyi ki geldiniz… Siz ve insanlarınız, kanımıza yeni bir güç katacaksınız. Geminiz, Besleyenler'i yeni dünyalara taşıyacak. Küllerimizden doğacağız."
